pageContent: Introduction and objective: High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound (HIFU) is a technology that has moved from being used for benign prostate disease to the treatment of prostate cancer. A technology review was undertaken to guide patients and physicians as to its suitability.

metaData.source:
Prostatic tissue ablation by transrectal high intensity focused ultrasound: histological impact and clinical application
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11237038/
